name: 'merica
description:
grounded: a unique flooring alternative

each mat is digitally dyed with an original hand cut paper design from the girls at domestic construction

23" x 36"
46" x 66"

indoor/outdoor {best if not in direct sunlight}

skid-resistant rubber backing

machine wash/air dry flat

low profile allows doors to pass over easily

name: paper dome
description:
grounded +: a unique flooring alternative in collaboration with
cecilia elguero

Cecilia Elguero is an Argentinian-born, Brooklyn based artist. Her work spans from sculpture to installation to jewelry design. Her design work explores the potential of utilitarian objects to bring a little bit of magic to our daily lives. She works with a range of materials from paper to wood, with a special affinity for clay for its material characteristics and its sustainable aspect.
http://ceciliaelguero.com/

each mat is digitally dyed with a photographic image of the artist's collaboration with domestic construction.

46" x 66"
23" x 36"

indoor/outdoor {best if not in direct sunlight}

skid-resistant rubber backing


machine wash/air dry flat

low profile allows doors to pass over easily

name: your type of wood
description:
grounded +: a unique flooring alternative in collaboration with
cleanwash letterpress

cleanwash letterpress is a fully solar powered print shop located in philadelphia, pa. measuring in 128ths of an inch, cleanwash offers custom letterpress printing for all of your business and personal needs, and produces a line of greeting cards that allow you to insult someone and tell them that they are loved all at once. 
http://cleanwashletterpress.com

each mat is digitally dyed with a photographic image of the artist's collaboration with domestic construction.

23" x 36"
46" x 66"

indoor/outdoor {best if not in direct sunlight}

skid-resistant rubber backing


machine wash/air dry flat

low profile allows doors to pass over easily

name: splat
description:
grounded +: a unique flooring alternative in collaboration with
cook & gates 

cook & gates was born in brooklyn a little over a year ago, when sara gates and ethan cook discovered their mutual love of dyeing fabric. now run solely by gates, everything is hand dyed and sewn in her greenpoint studio.
www.cookandgates.bigcartel.com

each mat is digitally dyed with a photographic image of the artist's collaboration with domestic construction.


23" x 36"
46" x 66"

indoor/outdoor {best if not in direct sunlight}

skid-resistant rubber backing


machine wash/air dry flat

victorfarnsworth.blogspot.com 

each mat is digitally dyed with a photographic image of the artist's collaboration with domestic construction.

name: road.runner
description:
grounded +: a unique flooring alternative in collaboration with
megan cedro.

artist megan cedro is a self taught painter/illustrator.  she was born in
the southern swamplands of florida and began her exploration of
drawing in the garden state.  throughout her adolescence, she crafted her signature style that has resonated throughout her entire current collection of work.  the personal grasp for human identity and self- awareness in a constantly changing and amorphous body is the dominant motif in her work.  the cartoon-like images are highly expressive, symbolic and often anthropomorphic perceptions of the people around her.  she describes her work as folklore, inspired by nature and fashion.

http://megancedro.com

each mat is digitally dyed with a photographic image of the artist's collaboration with domestic construction.

23" x 36"
46" x 66"

indoor/outdoor {best if not in direct sunlight}

skid-resistant rubber backing


machine wash/air dry flat

low profile allows doors to pass over easily

name: skullz
description:
grounded +: a unique flooring alternative in collaboration with
max dworkin

max dworkin graduated with a BFA in photo from SVA in 2006 and lives and works in brooklyn new york. he is currently working freelance as a photographer and photo assistant, he also is the photo editor at Remember Paper magazine as well as contributor. 
http://maxdworkin.com/

each mat is digitally dyed with a photographic image of the artist's collaboration with domestic construction.


23" x 36"
46" x 66"
